khto ye shanoblyvyy pid chas yikhnikh Kontaktnykh Molytv (Salat)
Ta vony unykayutʹ marnoyi rozmovy
Ta vony dayutʹ yikhnyu obov'yazkovu dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat)
Ta vony pidtrymuyutʹ yikhniy chastity
Tilʹky z yikhnim podruzhzhyam, abo tsey khto ye zakonno yikhniy, roblyatʹ vony mayutʹ stattyevi vidnoshennya; vony ne musyatʹ buty osudzheni
Tsey khto porushuyutʹ tsi mezhi yavlyayutʹ soboyu porushnykiv
Koly yomu prybuvaye deponuye dovirenyy yim, tak zhe, yak i budʹ-yaki dohovory vony roblyatʹ, vony ye dostovirni
Ta vony zauvazhuyutʹ yikhni Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat) rehulyarno
Takyy yavlyayutʹ soboyu inheritors
Vony uspadkuyutʹ Ray, prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy
My stvoryuvaly lyudsʹkyy buduchy z pevnoho riznovydu hryazyuky
Z·hodom, my vidtvoryly yoho z tiny krapli, shcho rozmishchuyetʹsya u dobre zakhyshchenyy sklad

Todi my rozrobyly kraplyu u vishayuchu (embryo), todi rozvyvalysya vishayuchyy (embryo) u ukus-velychyna (fetus), todi utvoryly ukus-velychyna (fetus) u kistky, todi nakryly kistky z m'yasom. My takym chynom vyroblyayemo novyy vytvir. Naybilʹsh blahoslovlenyy BOH, krashchyy Creator
Todi, piznishe, vy vmyrayete
Todi, na Dni Resurrection, vy budete resurrected
My stvoryuvaly nad vamy sim vsesvitu u verstvakh, ta my nikoly ne unaware yedynoho vytvoru u nykh
My posylayemo vnyz z neba voda, u tochniy miri, todi my zberihayemo tse u zemli. Zvychayno, my mozhemo dozvolyty tse vtecha
Z tse, my vyroblyayemo dlya vas fruktovi sady palʹm daty, vynohradu, vsikh riznovydiv fruktiv, ta riznomanitnykh produktiv kharchuvannya
Takozh, derevo urodzhenetsʹ Sinai vyroblyaye naftu, tak zhe, yak i relish dlya eaters

Ta domashna khudoba musytʹ zabezpechyty vas z urokom. My dozvolyayemo vy p'yete (moloko) z yikhnikh shlunkiv, vy oderzhuyete inshyy maye vyhodu z nykh, ta deyakykh z nykh vy vykorystovuyete dlya prodovolʹstva
Na nykh, ta na korabli, vy yidete
My poslaly Noah do yoho lyudey, kazhuchy, "O moyi lyudy, obozhnyuyutʹ BOHA. Vy ne mayete inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Chy ne mohly b vy ne spravedlyvyy

lidery shcho disbelieved sered yoho lyudey skazaly, "Tse ne vyhlyadaye bilʹsh nizh lyudsʹki yak vy, khto zakhoche otrymaty prominence sered vas. BOH willed, Vin mih poslaly vnyz anhely. My nikoly ne pochuly budʹ shcho lyubymo tse z nashykh predkiv
Vin znyknutʹ prosto lyudyna bozhevilʹna. Tilʹky ihnoruvaty yoho dlya deyakoho chasu
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, harantuyutʹ meni peremoha, dlya vony disbelieved meni

My todi nadykhnuly yoho: "Zrobitʹ watercraft pid nashymy watchful ochamy, ta z·hidno z nashym natkhnennyam. Koly nasha komanda prybuvaye, ta naryvy atmosfery, uvimkayutʹ tse para kozhnoho riznovydu (vashoho domesticated tvaryny), ta vasha rodyna, krim tsykh zasudzhenoyi shchob pryrikatysya. Ne rozmovlyayte z Meni vid imeni tsykh khto porushyly; vony budutʹ tonutysya
Odnoho "razu vy ulahodzhuyetesʹ, razom z tsymy khto z vamy, na watercraft, vy budete skazaty, `praise BOH dlya toho, shchob ryatuvaty nas z z·hubnykh lyudey
Ta kazhutʹ, `my Lord, dozvolenyy meni disembark na blahoslovenne roztashuvannya; Vy yavlyayete soboyu krashchyy deliverer
Tsey musyte zabezpechyty dostatni dokazy dlya vas. My zvychayno postavymo vas do testu
Z·hodom, my vstanovyly inshu heneratsiyu pislya nykh
My poslaly yim kur'yer z chysla yim, kazhuchy, "Vy budete obozhnyuvaty BOHA. Vy ne mayete inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Chy ne mohly b vy ne spravedlyvyy

lidery sered yoho lyudey shcho disbelieved ta vidkhylyly ideyu U maybutnʹomu - khocha my yakshcho dlya nykh velykodushno u tsʹomu zhytti - skazaly, "Tse ne ye bilʹsh nizh lyudsʹkyy vyhlyadayuche yak vy. Vin hostytʹsya z shcho vy hostytesya, ta napiy tomu shcho vy p'yete
Yakshcho vy pidkoryayetesya lyudsʹkyy vyhlyadayuchym yak vy, todi vy diysno losers
vin obitsyaye vam shcho, pislya vy vmyraye ta obih u pyl ta kistky, vy vyydete znov
Nemozhlyvo, nemozhlyvo diysno shcho obitsyayetʹsya do vas
My tilʹky zhyvemo tse zhyttya - my zhyvemo ta vmyrayemo - ta my budemo nikoly resurrected
Vin ye tilʹky lyudyna kotra vyhotovyla brekhnyu ta prypysala yim do BOHA. My nikoly ne povirymo yomu
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, harantuyutʹ meni peremoha, dlya vony disbelieved meni
Vin skazav, "Skoro vony budutʹ zasmucheni
retribution ukladeni yim, equitably, ta otzhe, my povernuly yikh u ruyiny. Bezputni lyudy zahynuly
Z·hodom, my vstanovyly inshi heneratsiyi pislya nykh
Niyaka spilʹnota ne mozhe prosunutysya yoho predetermined dolya, ne zatrymuyutʹ tse

Todi my poslaly nashym kur'yeram pidryad. Kozhnyy chas kur'yer poyikhav do yoho spilʹnoty, vony disbelieved yo. Otzhe, my vynyshchyly yikh, pislya inshyy, ta zroblenoho yim istoriyu. Lyudy shcho disbelieved zahynuly
Todi my poslaly Moses ta yoho brat Aaron z nashymy vidkryttyamy ta hlybokym dokazom
Pharaoh ta yoho elders, ale vony povernulysya zukhvali. Vony buly hnityuchi lyudy
Vony skazaly, my 'Budemo poviryty dlya dvokh lyudey chyyi lyudy ye nashi raby
Vony vidkhylyly dva, ta otzhe, vony buly vynyshcheni
My daly Moses svyate pysannya, shcho vony mozhutʹ keruvatysya
My zrobyly synu Mary ta yoho materi znak, ta my daly yim prytulok na mesa z prodovolʹstvom ta napoyim
O vy kur'yery, hostyatʹsya z harnykh umov, ta roboty righteousness. YA znayu tsilkom vse vy
Takyy ne zmozhu vash congregation odyn congregation - ta ya ye vash Lord; vy budete povaha Meni
Ale vony rozirvaly sebe u dysputuyuchi fraktsiyu; kozhna storona shchaslyva z yaki vony
Tomu, tilʹky lyshayutʹ yikh u yikhnʹomu zamishanni, dlya deyakoho chasu
Roblyatʹ vony dumayutʹ shcho, z my yakshcho yim z hroshamy ta ditʹmy
my obov'yazok showering yim z blahoslovennyam? Diysno, vony ne mayutʹ ideyi
Bezsumnivno, tsey khto ye shanoblyvo svidomyy yikhnʹoho Lorda
Ta khto viryatʹ v apokalipsysu yikhnʹoho Lorda
Ta khto nikoly ne vstanovlyuvav budʹ-yakykh idoliv bilya yikhnʹoho Lorda
Tomu shcho vony dayutʹ yikhni dobrodiynistʹ, yikhni serdenʹka ye tsilkom shanoblyvi. Dlya vony vyznayutʹ shcho vony budutʹ sklykatysya pered tym, yak yikhniy Lord
Vony ye neterplyachi zrobyty spravedlyvi pratsi; vony konkuruyutʹ u roblyachykh yim
My nikoly tyahar budʹ-yaka dusha poza yoho zasobamy, ta my ne derzhymo zapys shcho vymovlyaye pravdu. Niyakyy kozhnyy ne zaznaye nespravedlyvosti
Tomu, shcho yikhni rozum ye oblivious do tse, vony zdiysnyuyutʹ pratsi shcho ne prystosovuyutʹsya z tse; yikhni pratsi zlo
Todi, koly my requite yikhni lidery z retribution, vony skarzhatʹsya
Ne skarzhatʹsya zaraz; vy vidmovylysya vid vsiyeyi dopomohy z nas
Moyi dokazy buly predstavleni do vas, ale vy povernulysya nazad na vashykh p'yatakh
Vy buly nadto zukhvali vyznaty yikh, ta vy defiantly disregarded yim
Chomu vony ne viddzerkalyuyutʹ na tse svyate pysannya? Vony ne zdiysnyuyutʹ shcho vony otrymaly shchosʹ nikoly ne dosyahnute yikhnimy predkamy
vony vyyshly z ladu vyznaty yikhnʹoho kur'yera? Tse chomu vony disregarding yo
vony vyrishyly shcho vin ye bozhevilʹnyy? Diysno, vin prynis pravdu yim, ale bilʹshistʹ yikh nenavydyatʹ pravdu
Diysno, yakshcho b pravda prystosuvalasya do yikhnikh bazhanʹ, tam by bula khaos u nebi ta zemli; vse u nykh bulo by korumpovane. My daly yim yikhniy dokaz, ale vony disregarding yikhniy dokaz
vy prosyte yikh dlya zarplaty? Vasha zarplata Lorda daleko krashche. Vin yavlyaye soboyu krashchoho Provaydera
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, vy zaproshuyete yikh do pryamoho shlyakhu
Tsey khto disbelieve u U maybutnʹomu bude bezsumnivno deviate z prava shlyakh
Rivni koly my showered yim z myloserdyam, ta relieved yikhni problemy, vony porynuly bilʹsh hlyboki u porushennya, ta prodovzhuvalysʹ do pomylky
Rivni koly my afflicted yim z retribution, vony nikoly ne povernulysya do yikhnʹoho blahayuchykh Lordom
Z·hodom, koly my requited yim z suvorym retribution vony pidpaly, vony buly shokovani
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto harantuvav vam slukhannya, zir, ta mizky. Ridko vy appreciative
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto vstanovyv vas na zemli, ta pered tym, yak Yo vy budete sklykatysya
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto kontrolyuye zhyttya ta smertʹ, ta Vin yavlyaye soboyu odnikh kotrykh zastupnykiv nich ta denʹ. Vy ne rozumiyete
Vony skazaly shcho yikhni predky skazaly
Vony skazaly, "Pislya my vmyrayemo ta stayemo pylom ta kistkamy, my pryyizhdzhayemo resurrected
Taki obitsyanky davalysʹ nam ta do nashykh batʹkiv ranishe. Tse - ni bilʹsh nizh povisti z mynuli
Kazhete, "Komu nalezhytʹ zemli ta kozhnomu na tse, yakshcho vy znayete
Vony skazhutʹ, "Do BOHA." Skazhitʹ, "Chomu todi vy ne berete uvahu
Kazhutʹ, "Khto yavlyaye soboyu Lorda semy vsesvitu; Lord velykoho dominion
Vony skazhutʹ, "BOH." Skazhitʹ, "Chomu todi vy ne povertayete spravedlyvyy

Kazhutʹ, "U chyyiy rutsi vesʹ suverenitet vsi rechi, ta Vin zakinchuyetʹsya yavlyaye soboyu tilʹky odyn khto mozhe zabezpechyty dopomohu, ale zakinchuyetʹsya potreby ni dopomoha, yakshcho vy ne zakinchuyetʹsya znayete
Vony skazhutʹ, "BOH." Skazhitʹ, "De vy poyikhaly nepravylʹni
My daly yim pravdu, v toy chas, yak vony brekhuny

BOH nikoly ne begotten syn. Ne buv tam kolysʹ budʹ-yakyy inshyy boh bilya Yoho. Inakshe, kozhnyy boh by zayavyv nezalezhnistʹ z yoho stvorennyam, ta vony by konkuruvaly z odyn odnoho dlya dominance. BOH glorified; daleko nahori yikhniy vymahaye
Knower vsikh tayemnytsʹ ta deklaratsiy; Vin exalted, daleko nahori mayuchyy partner
Kazhete, "Miy Lord, Vy pokazuyete chy meni (retribution) vony pidpaly
Miy Lord, dozvolenyy meni ne budutʹ odyn z porushuyuchykh lyudey
Shchob pokazaty vam (retribution) my zarezervovani dlya nykh shchosʹ my mozhemo lehko zrobyty
Tomu, protylezhne yikhnye zlo pratsi z dobrotoyu; my znayemo tsilkom yikhni pretenziyi
Kazhu, "Miy Lord, ya shukayu prytulku u Vas z shepotu chortiv
Ta ya shukayu prytulku u Vas, miy Lord, lest vony prybuvayutʹ bilya meni
Koly smertʹ prybuvaye do odyn z nykh, vin kazhe, "Miy Lord, posylayutʹ meni nazad
ya todi popratsyuyu righteousness u vse ya lyshav." Ne virnyy. Tse ye nevirna pretenziya shcho vin robytʹ. Bar'yer vidokremytʹ yoho dushu z tsʹoho svitu do resurrection
Koly rih duyetʹsya, niyaki vidnoshennya sered nykh ne budutʹ isnuvaty na shcho denʹ, ne bude vony pikluyutʹsya pro odyn odnym
Yak dlya tsykh chyyikh tyahariv ye vazhki, vony budutʹ peremozhtsi
Tsi chyyi tyahari svitlo yavlyayutʹ soboyu kotri zahubylo yikhni dushi; vony perebuyutʹ u Pekli zavzhdy
Vohonʹ bude overwhelm yikhni oblychchya, ta vony ostanni miserably tam
ne Moyi vidkryttya deklamuvalysʹ do vas, ta vy derzhalysʹ na vidkhylyayuchykh yim
Vony skazhutʹ, "Nash Lord, nash wickedness overwhelmed ny, ta my lyudy zablukalysya
Nash Lord, berutʹ nas z tse; yakshcho my vertayemo (do nashoyi staroyi povedinky), todi my ye diysno bezputni
Vin skazhe, "Perebuyutʹ tam, prynyzyv, ta ne rozmovlyayutʹ z Meni
hrupa Moyikh sluzhbovtsiv zvychayno kazala, `our Lord, my poviryly, tak probachayemo nam ta nam zlyvy z myloserdyam. Vsikh myloserdnykh, Vy yavlyayete soboyu Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Ale vy vysmiyaly ta ridiculed yim, v obsyazi shcho vy zabuly Meni. Vy zvychayno smiyalysya z nykh
ya nahorodyv yikh sʹohodni, v obmin na yikhniy steadfastness, roblyachy yim peremozhtsi
Vin skazav, "Yak dovhi vy vytrymaly na zemli? Skilʹky rokiv
Vony skazaly, "My vytrymaly denʹ abo chastynu dnya. Poprositʹ tsi khto rozrakhuvaly
Vin skazav, "Faktychno, vy zalyshylysya ale rezyume tymchasove, yakshcho vy tilʹky znaly
Zrobyly vy dumayete shcho my utvoryly vas marno; shcho vy ne musyte buty povernuti do nas
Naybilʹsh exalted BOH, virnyy Suverennyy. Nemaye inshoho boha bilya Yoho; naybilʹshyy Pochesnyy Lord, possessor vsʹoho avtorytetu
Budʹ khto khto idolizes bilya BOHA budʹ-yakyy inshyy boh, ta bez budʹ-yakoho riznovydu dokazu, yoho rozrakhunok vidpochyvaye z yoho Lordom. disbelievers nikoly ne mayutʹ uspikh
Kazhutʹ, "Miy Lord, ny zlyvy z forgiveness ta myloserdyam. Vsikh myloserdnykh, Vy yavlyayete soboyu Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
sura shcho my poslaly vnyz, ta my ukhvalyly tomu shcho zakon. My vidkryly u tse yasni vidkryttya, shcho vy mozhete vzyaty uvahu

adulteress ta adulterer vy budete khlyst kozhnyy z nykh sto viy. Ne kolysatysya zhalistyu z vykonuyuchoho BOZHOHO zakonu, yakshcho vy spravdi viryte v BOHU ta ostannʹomu Dnyu. Ta dozvolyayutʹ hrupu svidka viruyuchiv yikhniy shtraf
adulterer zakinchytʹsya odruzhuyutʹsya adulteress abo idol worshiper, ta adulteress zakinchytʹsya odruzhuyutʹsya adulterer abo idol worshiper. Tse zaboronyayetʹsya dlya viruyuchiv

Tsey khto zvynuvachuyutʹ odruzhenykh zhinok adyulʹtera, todi ne spromozhetesʹ shchob vyrobyty chotyrʹokh svidkiv, vy budete yim khlysta visimdesyat viyi, ta ne vyznayutʹ budʹ-yake svidchennya z nykh; vony ye bezputni
Yakshcho vony kayutʹsya piznishe ta reforma, todi BOH Forgiver, Myloserdnyy

Yak dlya tsykh khto zvynuvachuyutʹ yikhnye vlasne podruzhzhya, bez budʹ-yakykh inshykh svidkiv, todi svidchennya mozhe buty vyznane yakshcho vin prysyahaye BOHOM vchetvero shcho vin rozpovidaye pravdu
p'yata klyatva bude shchob zaznaty BOZHOHO osudu na yoho, yakshcho vin lezhav
Vona povynna buty roz·hlyanuta nevynnyy yakshcho vona prysyahaye BOHOM vchetvero shcho vin ye brekhun
p'yata klyatva bude zaznaty BOZHOHO hnivu na yiyi yakshcho vin rozpovidav pravdu
Tse ye BOZHA charivnistʹ ta myloserdya do vas. BOH Redeemer, Naybilʹsh Mudryy

banda sered vy vyrobyly velyku brekhnyu. Ne podumayte shcho bulo pohano dlya vas; zamistʹ tsʹoho, bulo harno dlya vas. Tym chasom, kozhnyy odyn z nykh zarobyv yoho aktsiyu provyny. Yak dlya khto zapochatkuvav vesʹ vypadok, vin zaznav strashnoho retribution
Koly vy pochuly tse, viryache lyudyam ta viryachym zhinkam musyly maty krashchi dumky pryblyzno sebe, ta musyly musyly skazaty, "Tse ye ochevydno velyka brekhnya
Tilʹky yakshcho vony vyrobyly chotyrʹokh svidkiv (vy mozhete poviryty yim). Yakshcho vony ne spromozhutʹsya shchob vyrobyty svidkiv, todi vony, za BOHOM, brekhunamy
Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya BOZHOYI charivnosti do vas, ta Yoho myloserdya u tsʹomu sviti ta u U maybutnʹomu, vas by zaznaly velykoho retribution vnaslidok tsʹoho vypadku
Vy vyhotovyly tse z vashymy vlasnymy yazykamy, ta reshtoyu vas neodnorazove tse z vashymy hyrlamy bez dokazu. Vy podumaly tse bulo zvychayne, koly yomu, za BOHOM, hrosom
Koly vy pochuly tse, vy musyly skazaty, "My ne povtorymosʹ tse. Slava musytʹ Vy. Tse ye velykyy falsehood
BOH admonishes vy shcho vy budete nikoly ne zrobyty tse znov, yakshcho vy viruyuchi
BOH takym chynom roz'yasnyuye apokalipsys dlya vas. BOH Omniscient, Mudryy
Tsey khto lyublyatʹ pobachyty immorality rozpovsyudzhuvavsya sered viruyuchiv zaznaly bolisnoho retribution u tsʹomu zhytti ta u U maybutnʹomu. BOH znaye, v toy chas, yak vy ne znayete
zlyvy BOHA vy z Yoho charivnistyu ta myloserdyam. BOH Naybilʹsh Riznovyd do viruyuchiv, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnykh

O vy shcho vvazhayete, ne sliduyete za zakhodamy Satan. Budʹ khto khto sliduye za zakhodamy Satan musytʹ znaty shcho vin zakhyshchaye zlo ta porok. Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya BOZHOYI charivnosti do vas, ta Yoho myloserdya, zhodne z vy ne buly by ochyshcheni. Ale BOH ochyshchaye whomever Vin wills. BOH Slukhach, Knower

Tsey sered vas shcho blahoslovlyayetesʹ z resursamy ta bahat·stvom budete blahodiyni do yikhnikh rodychiv, bidnykh, ta tsey khto imihruvaly zarady BOH. Vony budutʹ obrobyty yikh z dobrotoyu ta terpymistyu; vy ne lyubyte dosyahnuty BOZHOHO forgiveness? BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Bezsumnivno, tsey khto nevirno zvynuvachuyutʹ odruzhenykh zhinok shcho ye nabizhni viruyuchi zaznaly osudu u tsʹomu zhytti ta u U maybutnʹomu; vony zaznaly horrendous retribution
denʹ prybude koly yikhni vlasni yazyky, ruky, ta nohy budutʹ davaty svidchennya do vse vony zrobyly
Na shcho denʹ, BOH bude requite yim tsilkom dlya yikhnikh pratsʹ, ta vony znaydutʹ shcho BOHA yavlyaye soboyu Pravdu

pohani zhinky dlya pohanykh lyudey, ta pohanykh lyudey dlya pohanykh zhinok, ta harnykh zhinok dlya harnykh lyudey, ta harnykh lyudey dlya harnykh zhinok. Ostanniy z vyshchenazvanykh nevynni takykh zvynuvachenʹ. Vony dosyahnuly forgiveness ta velykodushnoyi vynahorody
O vy shcho vvazhayete, ne vnosyte domivky za vynyatkom vashoho bez dozvolu z yikhnikh meshkantsiv, ta bez toho, shchob vitaty yikh. Tse ye krashche dlya vas, shcho vy mozhete vzyaty uvahu

Yakshcho vy ne znakhodyte u nykh, ne vnosyte yikh do vy otrymuyete dozvil. Yakshcho vy rozpovidayetesʹ, "Idete nazad," vy povynni poyikhaty nazad. Tse ye bilʹsh chyste dlya vas. BOH znaye tsilkom vse vy
Vy ne zdiysnyuyete pomylku vnosyachy uninhabited domivky prychomu ye shchosʹ shcho nalezhytʹ vam. BOH znaye vse vy vidkryvayete, ta vse vy prykhovuyete
Rozpovidayutʹ viryachyy lyudyam shcho vony budutʹ pidkoryty yikhni ochi (ta ne stare u zhinkakh), ta shchob pidtrymaty yikhniy chastity. Tse ye bilʹsh chyste dlya nykh. BOH tsilkom Cognizant vse vony

Ta rozpovidayutʹ viryachyy zhinkam pidkoryty yikhni ochi, ta pidtrymuyutʹ yikhniy chastity. Vony ne budutʹ vidkryty budʹ-yaki chastyny yikhnikh orhanizatsiy, krim shcho kotrykh ye neobkhidno. Vony budutʹ nakryty yikhni skryni, ta ne budutʹ budutʹ oslabyty tsey kod u prysutnosti za vynyatkom yikhnikh cholovikiv, yikhni batʹko, batʹko yikhnikh cholovikiv, yikhni syny, syny yikhnikh cholovikiv, yikhni braty, syny yikhnikh brativ, syny yikhnikh sester, inshi zhinky, cholovichi sluzhbovtsi abo sluzhbovtsi chyyi stattyevi zazhenutʹ ye znyshcheni, abo dity shcho ne dosyahly puberty. Vony ne budutʹ vrazyty yikhni nohy koly vony zakhodyatʹ zamova skhvylyuvatysya ta vidkryvayutʹ pevni detali yikhnikh orhanizatsiy. Vsi vy budete kayatysya do BOHA, O vy viruyuchi, shcho vy mozhete maty uspikh

Vy budete zaokhotyty ts vas shcho ye yedyni odruzhytysya. Vony mozhutʹ odruzhytysya spravedlyvyy sered vashoho muzhchyny ta zhinochykh sluzhbovtsiv, yakshcho vony ye bidni. BOH zbahatytʹ yikh z Yoho charivnosti. BOH ye Bounteous, Knower

Tsey khto ne mozhe buty spromozhnym prydbaty odruzhytysya bude pidtrymaty morality do BOHA zabezpechuye dlya nykh z Yoho charivnosti. Ta dayete yim z BOZHYY hroshovyy shcho Vin podaruvav vas. Vy ne budete prymusyty vashykh divchyn zdiysnyty prostitution, shukayuchy materialiv tsʹoho svitu, yakshcho vony bazhayutʹ buty nevynni. Yakshcho budʹ khto prymushuye yikh, todi BOH, bachachy shcho vony prymushuyutʹsya, Forgiver, Myloserdnyy
My vidkryly do vas roz'yasnyayuchi vidkryttya, ta pryklady z mynulykh heneratsiy, ta enlightenment dlya spravedlyvoho

BOH yavlyaye soboyu svitlo neba ta zemli. Alehoriya Yoho svitla shcho concave dzerkala pozadu lampy shcho rozmishchuyetʹsya vseredyni sklyanyy konteyner. Sklyanyy konteyner vyhlyadaye yak yaskravyy, perl-lyublyatʹ zirku. Palyvo tut postachayetʹsya z blahoslovennoyi nafty-vyroblyayuche derevo, shcho ni skhidnyy, ni zakhidnyy. Yoho nafta ye mayzhe sama-vyprominyuyucha; potrebuye niyakoho vohnyu ignite tse. Svitlo na svitlo. BOH keruye do Yoho svitla whoever wills (shchob keruvatysya). BOH takym chynom tsytuye prytchi dlya lyudey. BOH znaye tsilkom vsi rechi
(bozhe kerivnytstvo ye znaydene) u budynkakh exalted BOHOM, dlya Yoho nazvy svyatkuyetʹsya tam. Glorifying Yo tam, denʹ ta nich

BOH zvychayno nahorodytʹ yikh dlya yikhnikh harnykh pratsʹ, ta bude yim zlyvy z Yoho charivnistyu. BOH zabezpechuye dlya whomever Vin wills bez mezh

Yak dlya tsykh khto disbelieve, yikhni pratsi vyhlyadayutʹ yak mirage u pusteli. Stomlena sprahoyu osoba dumaye shcho tse - voda. Insha alehoriya shcho buduchy u zahalʹniy temryavi u midst nasylʹnytsʹkoho okeanu, z khvylyamy na khvyli, krim tovstoho tumanu. Temryava na temryavu - yakshcho vin podyvyvsya na yoho vlasnu ruku, vin mih ledve pobachyty tse. Whomever BOH pozbavlyaye svitla, bude ne maty svitla
vy ne zdiysnyuyete shcho kozhnyy u nebi ta zemli glorifies BOH, navitʹ ptakhy tomu shcho vony letyatʹ u koloni? Kozhnyy znaye yoho molytvu ta yoho glorification. BOH znaye tsilkom vse vony
Do BOHA nalezhytʹ suverenitetu neba ta zemli, ta do BOHA yavlyaye soboyu zaklyuchnu dolyu

vy ne zdiysnyuyete shcho BOH vede khmary, todi zbyraye yikh razom, todi nahromadzhuye yikh na odyn odnoho, todi vy bachyte , shcho doshch vytikayete z nykh? BOH kontrolyuye nich ta denʹ. Tse povynno buty urok dlya tsykh khto volodiyutʹ ochamy

My poslaly vnyz do vas roz'yasnyayuchi vidkryttya, todi BOH keruye whoever wills (shchob keruvatysya) u pryamomu shlyakhu
Yak kazhutʹ, "My virymo v BOHU ta u kur'yeri, ta my pidkoryayemosʹ," ale todi deyakyy z nykh kovzayemo nazad piznishe. Tse - ne viruyuchi
Koly vony zaproshuyutʹsya do BOHA ta Yoho kur'yera pryymaty rishennya sered nykh, deyakykh z nykh pryyizhdzhayutʹ perekynuti

tam khvoroba u yikhnikh serdenʹkakh? Vony doubtful? Vony shcho BOH ta Yoho kur'yer boyatʹsya mozhe obrobyty yikh nespravedlyvo? Faktychno, tse - vony shcho unjust

Tsey khto pidkoryayutʹsya BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru, ta BOH povahy ta zauvazhuyutʹ Yoho, tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu peremozhni
Vony prysyahayutʹ BOHOM, urochysto, shcho yakshcho b vy nakazaly yim mobilizuvaty, vony by mobilizuvaly. Skazhitʹ, "Ne prysyahayutʹ. Slukhnyanistʹ ye zobov'yazannya. BOH tsilkom Cognizant vse vy

Vy budete zauvazhyty Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat) ta dayete obov'yazkovu dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat), ta pidkoryayetesya kur'yeru, shcho vy mozhete dosyahnuty myloserdya

Odnoho razu dity dosyahayutʹ puberty, vony povynni poprosyty dozvil (pered tym yak vstupaty) lyublyatʹ tsi khto staly doroslymy lyudynoyu pered tym, yak yim poprosyly dozvil (pered tym yak vstupaty). BOH takym chynom roz'yasnyaye Yoho vidkryttya dlya vas. BOH Omniscient, Naybilʹsh Mudryy

stari zhinky shcho ne ochikuyutʹ odruzhytysya zdiysnyuyutʹ nichoho nepravylʹnyy rozslablyayuchysʹ yikhniy kod odyahu, yakshcho vony ne vidkryvayutʹ nadto bahato yikhnikh orhanizatsiy. Shchob pidtrymaty skromnistʹ krashche dlya nykh. BOH Slukhach, Knower

zaviska ne musytʹ buty osudzhena, pokalichena ne musytʹ buty osudzhena, ne yavlyaye soboyu pryvileyovanyy buty osudzhena, tilʹky tomu shcho vy ne musyte buty osudzheni dlya toho, shchob hostytysya u vashykh domivkakh, abo domivkakh vashykh batʹka, abo domivok vashykh materiv, abo domivok vashykh brativ, abo domivok vashykh sester, abo domivok vashykh brativ batʹka, abo domivok vashykh sester batʹko, abo domivky vashykh brativ materi, abo domivky vashykh sester materi, Abo domivky shcho nalezhatʹ vam ta vy volodiyete yikhnimy klyuchamy, abo domivkamy vashykh druziv. virni viruyuchi ye tsey khto viryatʹ v BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru, ta koly vony ye z nym u spilʹnoti zbory, vony ne lyshayutʹ yoho bez dozvolu. BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy

Ne obroblyayete prokhannya kur'yera tomu shcho vy obroblyayete kozhni prokhannya inshykh. BOH znaye tsilkom ts sered vas shcho pidkradayetesya daleko vykorystovuyutʹ nestali probachennya. Dozvolʹte yim beware - tsey khto ne pidkoryayutʹsya yoho zamovam - dlya lykha mozhe vrazyty yikh, abo suvoryy retribution
Absolyutno, do BOHA nalezhytʹ vse u nebi ta zemli. Vin tsilkom znaye kozhnu umovu vy mozhete buty. Denʹ vy vertayetesʹ yomu, Vin poinformuye yikh vse vony zrobyly. BOH znaye tsilkom vsi rechi
Naybilʹsh blahoslovlenyy yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto vidkryv Statutnu Knyhu do Yoho sluzhbovtsya, takym chynom vin mozhe sluzhyty yak warner do vsʹoho svitu
komu nalezhytʹ vsʹomu suverenitetu neba ta zemli. Vin nikoly ne mav syna, ne Vin mayutʹ budʹ-yakykh partneriv u suvereniteti. Vin utvoryv vse u tochniy miri; Vin akuratno zamyslyv vse

Tsey khto disbelieved skazanyy, "Tse ye vyhotovlennya shcho vin vyrobyv, z dopomohoyu deyakykh inshykh lyudey." Vony vymovyly blasphemy ta falsehood
Vony takozh skazaly, "Povisti z mynulyy shcho vin zapysav; vony buly prodyktovani yomu denʹ ta nich
Kazhutʹ, "Tse bulo vidkryte khto znaye Tayemnytsyu u nebi ta zemli. Vin Probachaye, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy

Prymitka yak vony zaklykaly vas vsi riznovydy nazv, ta yak tsykh pryvely yikh astray, nikoly ne znayty yikhniy shlyakh nazad

Faktychno, vony disbelieved u Hodyni (Denʹ Resurrection), ta my mayemo hotovyy do tsykh khto disbelieve u Hodyni flaming Peklo
Koly yomu bachytʹ yikh zdaleku, vony pochuyutʹ yoho rage ta fuming

Vy ne zayavyte tilʹky yedynyy remorse, na tomu dni; vy postrazhdayete cherez velyke chyslo remorses
Kazhutʹ, tse krashche abo vichnyy Ray shcho obitsyayetʹsya dlya spravedlyvyy? Tse yikh dobre zasluhovuyetʹsya vynahoroda; dobre zasluzhena dolya
Vony pryyizhdzhayutʹ budʹ shcho vony bazhayutʹ tam, zavzhdy. Tse ye vash Lord bezpovorotna obitsyanka
Na dni koly Vin sklykaye yikh, razom z idolamy vony vstanovyly bilya BOHA, Vin skazhe, vy pryzvely do pomylky tsi sluzhbovtsi Shakhty, abo zrobyly vony zablukayutʹsya na yikhnʹomu vlasnyy

Vony skazhutʹ, Vy glorified, tse bulo ne pravo na nas vstanovyty budʹ-yakykh lordiv bilya Vas. Ale Vy dozvolyly yim otrymaty nasolodu vid, razom z yikhnimy batʹkamy. Otzhe, vony disregarded povidomlennya ta takym chynom stalo bezputnymy lyudʹmy

Vony disbelieved u povidomlenni vy daly yim, ta, otzhe, vy mozhete niyaki zakhyshchayete yikh z retribution vony pidpaly, ne mozhutʹ vy dopomahayete yim u budʹ-yakomu shlyakhu. Budʹ khto sered vas shcho zdiysnyuye zlo, my zdiysnymo yoho do suvoroho retribution
My ne poslaly budʹ-yakym kur'yeram pered tym, yak vy shcho ne z'yiyily prodovolʹstvo ta zakhodyte rynky. My takym chynom vyprobovuyemo vas odyn odnoho; budete vy steadfastly persevere? Vash Lord Seer
